about_the_game:
"The Purge Club ～救済！粛清サークル～" is a visual novel game in a slapstick school where the protagonist, Hideaki Miyauchi joins the same club as the timid heroine to help her and grow together.
A Bishojo Game released in 2014 under the "Swan eye" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform for players around the world to enjoy.


◆Introduction
Many traps obstruct the path of Hideaki and his companions as they head toward the client's classroom.
Just like an action game with challenges like bullfighting, a giant rock, and finishing a huge maze!

Who in the world set up all these traps!?


◆Synopsis
The protagonist, Hideaki Miyauchi, was worried about his timid childhood friend.
Seina Takanashi from the same class, forces herself to help everyone with their problems.
The student council president Himeka who was watching this, is jealous of her popularity.

One day, Seina was called by the student council and was forced to become the president of a certain club!
The club's activity is to "save the client"?
Hideaki couldn't leave Seina alone and decided to help with the club activities.

However, the requests that come in are all outrageous!
Such as, "Stop the fight over bread in the cafeteria",
"Please pretend to be my lover because my friend bragging about her boyfriend is annoying".

As Seina and the others handle the requests, Himeka starts to get irritated.
Himeka decides to establish a new club and tries to take Hideaki with her.
Frustrated by Himeka's selfishness, Seina finally snaps...!

The purge by the timid Seina and Hideaki now begins!!


◆Characters
・Seina Takanashi
”Some day I hope I can be like that with Hideaki..."
A popular student in the school with bright-colored hair in a ponytail.
She has a crush on the protagonist and keeps trying to confess her feelings, but always being dodged away.
Feeling intimidated by the student council president, she ends up becoming the president of the club.

・Himeka Amauchi
"You shall respect me for the rest of your life. I won't allow any regrets."
A student council president fitting to be called Elegant or Amazing, embodying the elegance of a young lady.
Being jealous of Seina and Hideaki, she obstructs the club's activities by any means necessary.
She monopolizes the student council, but she cares deeply about the school more than anyone else.

・Nanaka Komada
"Oh... the scent of Seina senpai... it's so intoxicating..."
A freshman starting from spring, a cat-like junior who has always loved Seina.
To monopolize Seina, she treats the protagonist as a nuisance and plays pranks on him.
After the club activities, she stays in the clubroom and writes down her feelings for Seina in a notebook.

・Ikuha Toyota
"That's right! I'm the chairwoman! If you have any complaints, raise your hand!"
A classmate of the protagonist with glasses who is popular among both boys and girls.
She often discusses the protagonist about issues related to friendships.
She has long found the protagonist reliable and has a slight interest in him.

・Hideaki Miyauchi
An ordinary college student who has been childhood friends with Seina since elementary school.
Knowing that Seina is timid, he immediately agrees to help with the club without hesitation.
He is aware of Seina's feelings for him, but he only sees her as a childhood friend.

content_descriptors.notes: Some comedy scenes in the game include kissing scenes and other mild sexual content, mild violence, fictional criminal acts, derogatory language, strong language, and female-on-female interaction. May not be suitable for children or all ages.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows　7 / 8 / 8.1 /10(Including 64bit)

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual
Atos criminosos

short_description: In the name of the client, pretty and shy Seina will punish you! Pay back to the student council! Pay them back a double? Or maybe just a half payback...!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Swedish, Norwegian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
